verses.verse: He <S%G2036><s%> said to <S%G4314><s%> the disciples, <S%G3101><s%> "It is <S%G2076><s%> impossible <S%G418><s%> that <S%G3361><s%> no occasions of stumbling <S%G4625><s%> should come, <S%G2064><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> to him through <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> they come! <S%G2064><s%>

It would be better <S%G3081><s%> for him <S%G846><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> a <S%G3684><s%> millstone <S%G3458><s%> were hung <S%G4029><s%> around <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> neck, <S%G5137><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he were thrown <S%G4496><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%> rather than <S%G2228><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he should cause one <S%G1520><s%> of these <S%G5130><s%> little ones <S%G3398><s%> to stumble. <S%G4624><s%>

Be <S%G1161><s%> careful. <S%G4337><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> sins <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> you, <S%G4571><s%> rebuke <S%G2008><s%> him. <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> he repents, <S%G3340><s%> forgive <S%G863><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> he sins <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> seven times <S%G2034><s%> in the day, <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> seven times <S%G2034><s%> returns, <S%G2250><s%> <S%G1994><s%> <S%G4571><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3340><s%> 'I repent,' you <S%G4571><s%> shall forgive <S%G863><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>"
The <S%G2532><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> "Increase <S%G4369><s%> our <S%G2254><s%> faith. <S%G4102><s%>"

The <S%G1161><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> "If <S%G1487><s%> you had <S%G2192><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> a grain <S%G2848><s%> of mustard seed, <S%G4615><s%> you would tell <S%G3004><s%> <S%G99999><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> sycamore tree, <S%G4807><s%> <S%G1610><s%> 'Be uprooted, and <S%G2532><s%> be planted <S%G5452><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%>' and <S%G2532><s%> it would obey <S%G5219><s%> <S%G99999><s%> you. <S%G5213><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> is there among <S%G1537><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> a <S%G2112><s%> servant <S%G1401><s%> plowing <S%G722><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> keeping sheep, <S%G4165><s%> that will say, <S%G2046><s%> <S%G2112><s%> <S%G3739><s%> when he comes <S%G1525><s%> in from <S%G1537><s%> the field, <S%G68><s%> <S%G3928><s%> 'Come immediately and sit down at the table, <S%G377><s%>'

and <S%G235><s%> will <S%G2046><s%> not rather <S%G3780><s%> tell <S%G2046><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G2090><s%> 'Prepare <S%G5101><s%> my supper, <S%G1172><s%> clothe <S%G2532><s%> yourself <S%G4024><s%> properly, <S%G2532><s%> and serve <S%G1247><s%> me, <S%G3427><s%> while <S%G2193><s%> I eat <S%G5315><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drink. <S%G4095><s%> Afterward <S%G3326><s%> <S%G99999><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> shall eat <S%G5315><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drink <S%G4095><s%>'?

Does he <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3361><s%> thank <S%G5485><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> servant <S%G1401><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he did <S%G4160><s%> the things that <S%G3588><s%> were commanded? <S%G1299><s%> <S%G846><s%> I think <S%G1380><s%> not. <S%G3756><s%>

Even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> also, <S%G3752><s%> when you have done <S%G4160><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the things that <S%G3588><s%> are commanded <S%G1299><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> say, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G2070><s%> 'We are unworthy <S%G888><s%> servants. <S%G3754><s%> We have done <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3754><s%> our <S%G4160><s%> duty. <S%G3784><s%>'"

It <S%G2532><s%> happened <S%G1096><s%> as <S%G1722><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was on his way <S%G4198><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> that <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was passing <S%G1330><s%> along <S%G1223><s%> the borders <S%G3319><s%> of Samaria <S%G4540><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>

As <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> village, <S%G2968><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> men <S%G435><s%> who were lepers <S%G3015><s%> met <S%G528><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> at a distance. <S%G4207><s%>
They <S%G846><s%> lifted up <S%G142><s%> their voices, <S%G5456><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Master, <S%G1988><s%> have mercy <S%G1653><s%> on us! <S%G2248><s%>"

When <S%G2532><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> them, <S%G2036><s%> he said to them, <S%G846><s%> "Go <S%G4198><s%> and show <S%G1925><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> to the priests. <S%G2409><s%>" It <S%G2532><s%> happened that <S%G1096><s%> as <S%G1722><s%> they went, <S%G5217><s%> they <S%G846><s%> were cleansed. <S%G2511><s%>

One <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> when he saw <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he was healed, <S%G2390><s%> turned back, <S%G5290><s%> glorifying <S%G1392><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice. <S%G5456><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his face <S%G4383><s%> at <S%G3844><s%> Jesus <S%G846><s%>' feet, <S%G4228><s%> giving <S%G2168><s%> him <S%G846><s%> thanks; <S%G2168><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> a Samaritan. <S%G4541><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> <S%G2036><s%> "Weren't <S%G3780><s%> the <S%G2511><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> cleansed? <S%G2511><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> are the nine? <S%G1767><s%>

Were <S%G2147><s%> there none <S%G3756><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> who returned <S%G5290><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> to God, <S%G2316><s%> except <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> stranger? <S%G241><s%>"

Then <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Get up, <S%G450><s%> and go your way. <S%G4198><s%> Your <S%G4675><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> has <S%G4982><s%> healed <S%G4982><s%> you. <S%G4571><s%>"

Being <S%G1161><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> when <S%G4219><s%> the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> would come, <S%G2064><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532><s%> "The Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> doesn't <S%G3756><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> observation; <S%G3907><s%>

neither <S%G3761><s%> will they say, <S%G2046><s%> <S%G2400><s%> 'Look, here! <S%G5602><s%>' or, <S%G2228><s%> <S%G2400><s%> 'Look, there! <S%G1563><s%>' for <S%G1063><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> within <S%G1787><s%> you. <S%G5216><s%>"

He <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the disciples, <S%G3101><s%> "The days <S%G2250><s%> will come, <S%G2064><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> you will desire <S%G1937><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the days <S%G2250><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man, <S%G444><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you will <S%G3700><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> see it. <S%G3700><s%>

They <S%G2532><s%> will tell <S%G2046><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> <S%G2400><s%> 'Look, here! <S%G5602><s%>' or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G99999><s%> 'Look, there! <S%G1563><s%>' Don't <S%G3361><s%> go <S%G565><s%> away, <S%G3366><s%> nor follow <S%G1377><s%> after them, <S%G565><s%>

for <S%G1063><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> the lightning, <S%G796><s%> when it flashes <S%G797><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the one <S%G3588><s%> part under <S%G5259><s%> the sky, <S%G3772><s%> shines <S%G2989><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the other <S%G3588><s%> part under <S%G5259><s%> the sky; <S%G3772><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> will <S%G2071><s%> the <S%G2532><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> be <S%G2071><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> first, <S%G4412><s%> he <S%G846><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> suffer <S%G3958><s%> many things <S%G4183><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> be rejected <S%G593><s%> by <S%G575><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> generation. <S%G1074><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> it happened <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of Noah, <S%G3575><s%> even so <S%G3779><s%> will it be <S%G2071><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man. <S%G444><s%>

They ate, <S%G2068><s%> they drank, <S%G4095><s%> they married, <S%G1060><s%> they were given in marriage, <S%G1547><s%> until <S%G891><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> Noah <S%G3575><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the ship, <S%G2787><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the flood <S%G2627><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> destroyed <S%G622><s%> them all. <S%G537><s%>

Likewise, <S%G3668><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> it happened <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of Lot: <S%G3091><s%> they ate, <S%G2068><s%> they drank, <S%G4095><s%> they bought, <S%G59><s%> they sold, <S%G4453><s%> they planted, <S%G5452><s%> they built; <S%G3618><s%>

but <S%G1161><s%> in the day <S%G2250><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> Lot <S%G3091><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out <S%G575><s%> from Sodom, <S%G4670><s%> it rained <S%G1026><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sulfur <S%G2303><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the sky, <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> destroyed <S%G622><s%> them all. <S%G537><s%>
It will be <S%G2071><s%> the same <S%G2596><s%> way <S%G5024><s%> in <S%G3739><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> that <S%G601><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> is revealed. <S%G5023><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> he who <S%G3739><s%> will be <S%G2071><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the housetop, <S%G1430><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> goods <S%G4632><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the house, <S%G3614><s%> let him <S%G2597><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> go down <S%G2597><s%> to take <S%G142><s%> them <S%G846><s%> away. <S%G142><s%> Let <S%G2532><s%> him <S%G1994><s%> who is <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the field <S%G68><s%> likewise <S%G3668><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> turn <S%G1994><s%> <S%G1519><s%> back. <S%G1994><s%>
Remember <S%G3421><s%> Lot <S%G3091><s%>'s wife! <S%G1135><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> Whoever <S%G1437><s%> seeks <S%G2212><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> his <S%G846><s%> life <S%G5590><s%> loses <S%G622><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> but <S%G2532><s%> whoever <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3739><s%> loses <S%G622><s%> his life <S%G846><s%> preserves <S%G2225><s%> it. <S%G846><s%>

I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> in that <S%G3778><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> there will be <S%G2071><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> people in <S%G1909><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> bed. <S%G2825><s%> The one <S%G1520><s%> will be taken, <S%G3880><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the other <S%G2087><s%> will be left. <S%G863><s%>

There will be <S%G2071><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> grinding <S%G229><s%> grain <S%G1909><s%> together. <S%G846><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> will be taken, <S%G3880><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the other <S%G2087><s%> will be left. <S%G863><s%>"

They, <S%G2532><s%> answering, <S%G611><s%> asked <S%G3004><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Where, <S%G4226><s%> Lord? <S%G2962><s%>" He <S%G2962><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Where <S%G3699><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> is, <S%G1563><s%> there will <S%G4863><s%> the vultures also be gathered together. <S%G4863><s%>"
